email_1.subject: Weekly Report Reminder
email_1.content: Hi, please send the weekly progress report by 2 PM tomorrow. Include completed tasks and blockers.

email_2.subject: AI Trends – January Edition
email_2.content: Here are the latest industry updates: breakthroughs in LLM efficiency, new ML security standards, and upcoming conferences.

email_3.subject: Policy Update – Action Required
email_3.content: Please review and acknowledge the updated remote-work policy by Friday. The acknowledgment form is attached.

email_4.subject: Meeting Request – Sprint Planning
email_4.content: You are invited to Sprint Planning on Monday at 10 AM. Please confirm your availability and share agenda items.

email_5.subject: You won a FREE iPhone!
email_5.content: Congratulations! Click the link below to claim your prize now. Offer expires today!

email_6.subject: Critical System Alert – Immediate Attention
email_6.content: High CPU usage detected on production server node-3. Please investigate and confirm resolution status.
